title: Death of Genghis Khan and rise of khanates

content.prompt: Which of the following resulted from the fragmentation of the Mongol Empire following the death of Genghis Khan?

choices.label: The development of khanates in Central Asia
The spread of Islam into East Asia

topic.text: 2.2: The Mongol Empire and the Making of the Modern World

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
